attributes.action: Allow a 3rd EU referendum if the 2nd EU referendum is allowed
attributes.additional_details: look at the map of 'leave' voters, we dominate the map, its only scotland and london, oxford and cambridge that want to stay in, they are not seeing what the rest of us are, all the fears the remain camp have been saying will happen if we leave are already happening whilst we been in the EU. calm down wait 2-4 years fro dust to settle and we will have our amazing country back
attributes.background:
you cant keep having referendums if you dont like the outcome of the original one, if the 2nd referendum is allowed then its only fair we can have another crack at it
If you have another one and the outcome is the same will the remain vote want another referendum till they get the result they want?
